App Title: VACR Services 
 
 VACR is presenting the user with a variety of services that simplify resident's everyday life. And willing to cooperate with condominium managements to provide a wide range of services, delivered by well-qualified and background-checked professionals. 

 VACR Services currently provides most of the services residents need during MCO hoping to: 

 1- Prevent Covid-19 from spreading
 2- Ease Residents life
 3- Provide more job opportunities 
 
 

Features: This app will is displaying the following or it will be added soon:


• Beauty services at home:-It include our trained experts who use top-of-the-line products and provide a range of beauty services like massage, pedicure, manicure, waxing, threading, haircutting, etc. at the comfort of your home with our instant booking. 

• Home Cleaning Services:-A range of home cleaning services to make your life easy. Services for bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, furniture, lawn and pool cleaning as well as deep cleaning for the entire home. 

• Pest Control Services:-Choose from different pest control services like General pest control, cockroach control, Rat control, bedbug control, Ant Control, Termite control, etc., we ensure your immediate safety. 

• Home Appliance repair and services at home: - Our experts will examine and repair your home appliances in no time. We also provide repair services for Ac, Washing machines, Dishwashers, refrigerators, microwaves, chimneys, etc. at the earliest. 

• Plumbing Services at home:-With our trained and professional plumber you can solve all your plumbing problems like leaking pipe, bathroom fitting, sewage, toilet etc. 

• Electrical Installation and Repair Services at home: - We provide quick and safe services for all electrical work from wiring work to installing of switchboards etc. 

• Laundry Services: - We provide high-quality laundry, bleaching, and dry cleaning services from picking, washing, ironing, and returning laundry easily at your convenient day and time. 

• Car and Bike servicing at home:-We provide car and bike repairs, maintenance, washing, inspections at home, and breakdown maintenance anywhere. 

• Home Computer and Mobile Repair Service at home: - We offer service for all types of repairing of laptops, desktops, mobiles at home by our well-qualified hardware engineers without any delay. 

• Packer and Movers Services:-We offer reliable services for all your end-to-end relocation needs. We will take care of packing everything properly and moving the stuff to wherever you want on time. 

• Home a Tutor:-We offer home tutor services from qualified and friendly individuals according to your need whether it is academics, singing, or dancing. 

• Dog training/walking: - We will find dog trainers/walkers near you so that your dog doesn’t feel lonely when you are busy or on a holiday. 

• Personal training: - We want you to remain healthy and thus we can provide personal training at home itself from one of our expert service providers. 

 

Future Scope: 

We plan to extend VACR services as well as providing a comparison between the different services so that the user can easily choose what they want. 

We also will filter and display those service providers who are verified, expert professionals. 

VACR is also hoping to cooperate with condominium managements to manage all services provided to residents through VACR online Servers and Platforms. 

 

What makes VACR different? 

- All the services available to search in one app 

- Guaranteed quality of service 

- Certified, Background verified expert professional services 

- Easy and quick to book 

- Transparent and affordable price
